Name: Defend
Effect 1: Add defense of 2 to grid played on

Name: Missle Dome
Effect 1: Defend +4 on two adjacent tiles  (including diagonal)
Effect 3: the player has a chance to pick the tiles to defend

Name: Barricade
Effect 3: Defend +2 to all adjacent grids (including diagonal)

Name: Stone Skin
Effect 2: All tiles that had a card played on them (including this one) get Defense +2

Name: Durable Defense
Effect 2: This defense carries over on this grid tile for two more turns

Name: Archives
Effect 1: Discard any number of cards from your hand
Effect 2: Draw as many cards as was discarded (Note only draw after player has confirmed discarding is over)
